summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1926, for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue North from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and by the constructing of wooden curbs and gutters and all necessary drains and adjusting of all manholes and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 19844, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
